message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $165, but I was thinking more along the lines of $170. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $155. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I can see you're serious about the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $160?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $157.50?
I'm glad we're close, Bob. I can do $162.50, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. This is my final offer on that price point.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $160, which is my final offer. If you can meet me at this price, I'll buy the product from you.
